#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

string convert(string in){
    string newString = "";
    int len = in.length();
    for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
    {
      if(isalpha(in[i]))
       newString += tolower(in[i]);
    }
    return newString;
}

int main(){
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T = 0;
    
    cin >> T;
    cin.ignore();
    
    while(T--)
    {
      string in = "";
      getline(cin,in);
      in = convert(in);
      int len = in.length();
      int alpha[26];
      fill_n(alpha,26,0);
      for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
       alpha[(int)in[i]-'a']++;
      int highest = 0;
      int ind = 0;
      for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++)
      {
        if(alpha[i] >= highest)
        {
         highest = alpha[i];
         ind = i;
        }
      }
      cout << char(ind+'a') << endl;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
